channel.title: A couple of things on this server i made
channel.description:
ok listen all people i have told jagex about this company and they are going to shut it down and screw all server ips i give ok so beware this forum will be shutdown for reasons!
On the other hand rune-server has already been accepted by jagex due to it being paid for and most people go on their forums!
Just a list of servers been shutdown:
Darkheavenpkz (2007-2009) (Friends Only Server)
icepkscape (2009-2009) shutdown for good
So if you want more info on this pm me and not get yourself done
and moparscape will be fined alot if they dont take it down
